title: [Large-Scale] Learning Network and Reward System Design for Online Learning Community Activation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning tools and understanding of social interaction
context.additional_context: Need to foster collaboration and sustained participation among learners in social-sector communities of practice aimed at enhancing workplace competencies

learning_goals: Learners perform peer knowledge-sharing activities at least three times on mobile platforms within one week.
Learners maintain community engagement motivation by earning at least five virtual badges through a reward system.

Learners can collaborate with a 3â€“4 person team for one week to propose three actionable solutions (e.g., public transit route optimization, bike-sharing system expansion, pedestrian-only zone designation) for a local traffic issue, and submit a 10-page report achieving an average score of over 4 out of 5 on each criterion (creativity, feasibility, social impact) of the evaluation rubric.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
